title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.2 - Restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.2 - Restrictions

State Regulations

Records, reports and files of children who are or who have
been under the care or supervision of the Division for Youth, other than those
exceptions set forth in section
168.7
of this Subtitle, entitled
"Confidentiality of Division for Youth records," may not be disclosed in whole
or in part to any person, agency or institution, other than the Division for

Youth and the New York State Family Courts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-2.2

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
